verses.text: 各支派紮營的次序和位置耶和華對摩西和亞倫說：

words.note: Refers to God, the divine being.

verses.text: 「以色列人要各歸自己的旗下，在自己父家的旗號下安營；他們要在會幕四周稍遠的地方安營。

words.note: Used as a postposition here.

verses.text: 在東方向著日出之地，按著隊伍安營的，是猶大營的旗號；猶大人的領袖是亞米拿達的兒子拿順。

words.note: Classical Chinese particle, similar to '的'.

verses.text: 他的隊伍被數點的，共有七萬四千六百人。
在他旁邊安營的，是以薩迦支派；以薩迦人的領袖是蘇押的兒子拿坦業，

words.note: Refers to the tribe of Issachar.

verses.text: 他的隊伍被數點的，共有五萬四千四百人。

breakdown.m: dot, point (here: verb suffix for action)

words.note: Commonly used in biblical contexts for counting people or troops.
Forms a noun phrase from the preceding verb phrase.

words.pinyin: wǔ wàn sì qiān sì bǎi

verses.text: 又有西布倫支派；西布倫人的領袖是希倫的兒子以利押。

breakdown.m: sleeve (historical association with leading by hand)

verses.text: 他的隊伍被數點的，共有五萬七千四百人。

breakdown.m: dot, point (here: verb suffix for action)

words.note: Commonly used in biblical contexts for counting people or troops.
Forms a noun phrase from the preceding verb phrase.

words.pinyin: wǔ wàn qī qiān sì bǎi

verses.text: 凡是屬猶大營，按著隊伍被數點的，共有十八萬六千四百人；他們要首先出發。

words.note: Used to emphasize universality, 'whoever it is'.

breakdown.m: dot, point (here: verb suffix for action)

words.note: Commonly used in biblical contexts for counting people or troops.
Forms a noun phrase from the preceding verb phrase.

words.pinyin: shíbā wàn liù qiān sì bǎi
words.definition: one hundred eighty-six thousand four hundred

verses.text: 「在南方，按著隊伍，是流本營的旗號；流本人的領袖是示丟珥的兒子以利蓿。

words.note: Refers to a flag or standard, often used to identify a group.

breakdown.m: sleeve (historical association with leading by hand)

verses.text: 他的隊伍被數點的，共有四萬六千五百人。
在他旁邊安營的，是西緬支派；西緬人的領袖是蘇利沙代的兒子示路蔑。

words.note: Refers to the tribes of Israel

verses.text: 他的隊伍被數點的，共有五萬九千三百人。
又有迦得支派；迦得人的領袖是丟珥的兒子以利雅薩。

words.note: Refers to the tribes of Israel

verses.text: 他的隊伍被數點的，共有四萬五千六百五十人。
凡是屬流本營，按著隊伍被數點的，共有十五萬一千四百五十人；他們要作第二隊起行。

words.note: Lit. 'count points/individuals'

verses.text: 「會幕和利未人的營要在眾營中間前行；他們怎樣安營，就怎樣出發前行；各按本位，各歸本旗。

words.note: Lit. 'meeting tent'

verses.text: 「在西方，按著隊伍，是以法蓮營的旗號；以法蓮人的領袖是亞米忽的兒子以利沙瑪。

words.note: Lit. 'lead sleeve', meaning a leader.

verses.text: 他的隊伍被數點的，共有四萬零五百人。
在他旁邊的，是瑪拿西支派，瑪拿西人的領袖是比大蓿的兒子迦瑪列。

words.note: Lit. 'branch faction'

verses.text: 他的隊伍被數點的，共有三萬二千二百人。

words.pinyin: sān wàn èr qiān èr bǎi

verses.text: 又有便雅憫支派；便雅憫人的領袖是基多尼的兒子亞比但。
他的隊伍被數點的，共有三萬五千四百人。

words.pinyin: sān wàn wǔ qiān sì bǎi

verses.text: 凡是屬以法蓮營，按著隊伍被數點的，共有十萬零八千一百人；他們要作第三隊起行。

words.pinyin: shí wàn líng bā qiān yī bǎi
words.definition: one hundred eight thousand one hundred

words.note: Measure word for groups, e.g., 'the third company'

verses.text: 「在北方，按著隊伍，是但營的旗號；但人的領袖是亞米沙代的兒子亞希以謝。

words.note: Refers to a military banner or standard.

verses.text: 他的隊伍被數點的，共有六萬二千七百人。

words.note: Often used in biblical contexts for census-taking or counting people.
Turns a verb phrase into a noun phrase.

verses.text: 在他旁邊安營的，是亞設支派；亞設人的領袖是俄蘭的兒子帕結。

words.definition: to encamp, to set up camp

words.note: Commonly used in the Bible for the tribes of Israel.

verses.text: 他的隊伍被數點的，共有四萬一千五百人。
又有拿弗他利支派；拿弗他利人的領袖是以南的兒子亞希拉。
他的隊伍被數點的，共有五萬三千四百人。
凡是屬但營被數點的，共有十五萬七千六百人；他們要隨著自己的旗號，最後起行。」

words.note: Refers to the tribe/camp of Dan.
Commonly used in the Bible for census or counting.
Forms a modifying phrase.
Refers to tribal banners/standards in a military context.

verses.text: 以上是照著他們的父家被數點的以色列人；所有按著他們的隊伍在眾營中被數點的，共有六十萬零三千五百五十人。

words.note: Refers to patriarchal lineage or household in biblical context.
Commonly used in the Bible for census or counting.
Forms a modifying phrase.
The descendants of Jacob, God's chosen people.
Refers to the collective Israelite encampment.
Commonly used in the Bible for census or counting.
Forms a modifying phrase.

words.chinese: 六十萬零三千五百五十

verses.text: 只有利未人沒有數點在以色列人中，這是耶和華吩咐摩西的。

words.note: Members of the tribe of Levi, set apart for temple service.
Commonly used in the Bible for census or counting.
The descendants of Jacob, God's chosen people.
The covenant name of God in the Old Testament.
Forms a nominalized phrase, meaning 'that which was commanded by Moses'.

verses.text: 以色列人就照著耶和華吩咐摩西的一切行了，他們隨著自己的旗號安營，各人按著自己的宗族和父家起行。

words.note: The descendants of Jacob, God's chosen people.
The covenant name of God in the Old Testament.
Forms a modifying phrase, meaning 'that which was commanded by Moses'.
Refers to tribal banners/standards in a military context.
Refers to a larger lineage group than 'father's house'.
Refers to patriarchal lineage or household in biblical context.
